name: Rise of the Indie Tribe
description:
My Submission for the 2nd Annual Coding Blocks Game JJJJamuary Game Jam. 

This time using Unity Game Engine.

Meeting the theme "It's Following me":

  • The Indie Tribe are the IT in the theme.
  • The purple drones (Spheres) spawn from the Domed armories and follow the player.

Controls:

The controls are standard FPS controls.

WASD to move

Mouse to look and fire both weapons.

Space to jump.
